summary: This document is an email from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley, inquiring about Staley's availability to take a call from the chairman of Sal Oppenheim. The email emphasizes the confidentiality of the communication and includes a disclaimer regarding attorney-client privilege.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email, reaching out to Jes Staley regarding a call with the chairman of Sal Oppenheim.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is the recipient of the email from Jeffrey Epstein, being asked about his availability for a call.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein is inquiring about Jes Staley's availability for a call with the chairman of Sal Oppenheim.
The email contains a confidentiality disclaimer and mentions potential attorney-client privilege.
